biotools.summary: Predict the 12 main variants of human poly(A) motifs, i.e., AATAAA, ATTAAA, AAAAAG, AAGAAA, TATAAA, AATACA, AGTAAA, ACTAAA, GATAAA, CATAAA, AATATA, and AATAGA.

bioschemas.name: PolyAMotif
bioschemas.summary: Predict the 12 main variants of human poly(A) motifs, i.e., AATAAA, ATTAAA, AAAAAG, AAGAAA, TATAAA, AATACA, AGTAAA, ACTAAA, GATAAA, CATAAA, AATATA, and AATAGA.
